author: Anonymous Poet
title: Request for Possible TEXT-COLOUR Change?
question:
Hi!
This might be a random request, but I was wondering if it is possible for future assignments/tests, not to pre-define TEXT-COLOUR as "black"? 
I like using Racket in dark mode because its easier on the eyes but I can never see the results, which requires me to change it before and after submitting lol.
Thank you if you do consider! :)
instructor_answer:
just change it from "black" to "white"
When you are ready to submit your assignment, change the TEXT-COLOUR to its original state
